title: Prisoners of the Masquerade
description: "Ok, let's say my life has been crazy, crazier than most people on their craziest day. I've gone through a lot, and I've had a lot happen to me, and I think it's time tell that story."Scholarships are always good, right? Thatâ€™s what Calvin thought when he and six other kids received a scholarship to a prestigious university for the summer. While attending Calvin becomes concerned about the legitimacy of the school, though no one else believes him. Is Calvin overreacting, or will he be able to convince the others before disaster strikes? Find out in the first novel of the Prime Youth series.
author: E.E. Cooley
